participant_1.name: Liam Carpenter
participant_1.personality: Liam is creative and detail-oriented, always looking for ways to improve his craft. He is friendly and enjoys sharing stories about his work.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.

participant_2.name: Margaret Steele
participant_2.personality: Margaret is ambitious and has a strong will. She often expresses her thoughts candidly and has a whimsical sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind.

content.text: Hey! Do you enjoy building houses?
